name: Quick Tomato Pasta
description: A simple, delicious pasta dish using canned tomatoes and herbs.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil. Add canned tomatoes, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes. Toss with cooked pasta.

name: Pantry Black Bean Burgers
description: Hearty and flavorful burgers made entirely from pantry staples.
instructions: Mash black beans. Mix with breadcrumbs and spices. Form into patties and pan-fry until golden brown on both sides. Serve on buns.

name: Easy Tuna Melts
description: A classic comfort food sandwich that's quick to make for lunch.
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, and chopped celery. Place on bread with a slice of cheese. Grill or pan-fry until the bread is toasted and the cheese is melted.

name: Lentil Soup
description: A nourishing and easy-to-make soup with vegetables and lentils.
instructions: Sauté carrots, celery, and onion. Add garlic and tomato paste. Stir in lentils and vegetable broth. Simmer until lentils are tender.

name: Chicken and Rice
description: A one-pot meal that is both comforting and simple to prepare.
instructions: Season chicken with spices. Brown chicken in a pot. Add rice and broth, bring to a boil, then simmer until rice is cooked and liquid is absorbed.

name: Cheesy Potato Bake
description: A creamy and satisfying side dish or main course.
instructions: Slice potatoes and onion. Layer in a baking dish. Mix soup, milk, and cheese, then pour over the potatoes. Bake until potatoes are tender.

name: Pancake Stack
description: Fluffy pancakes made from simple ingredients you likely have in your pantry.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, whisk wet ingredients. Combine and cook on a hot griddle until bubbles form, then flip.

name: Baked Oatmeal
description: A great make-ahead breakfast, warm and customizable with what you have.
instructions: Combine all ingredients and pour into a baking dish. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 25-30 minutes until set. Serve warm.

name: Pasta with Garlic and Oil
description: An elegant and simple Italian dish that highlights fresh flavors.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté sliced garlic in olive oil. Add red pepper flakes. Toss the cooked spaghetti with the garlic and oil mixture. Garnish with fresh parsley.

name: Scrambled Eggs with Cheese
description: The ultimate quick breakfast or late-night snack.
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. Pour in the egg mixture. Cook, stirring gently, until eggs are set. Stir in cheese just before serving.

name: Simple Grilled Cheese
description: A classic grilled cheese sandwich, perfect every time.
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread. Place one slice butter-side down in a pan. Add cheese, top with the other slice of bread (butter-side up). Cook until golden, then flip and repeat.

name: Baked Potato with Sour Cream
description: A filling, easy meal with a fluffy interior and crisp skin.
instructions: Prick potatoes with a fork. Rub with olive oil and salt. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 45-60 minutes. Slice open and top with sour cream and chives.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: A comforting soup perfect for a cold day, made from pantry items.
instructions: Simmer carrots, celery, and onion in broth until tender. Add noodles and shredded chicken. Cook until noodles are done. Season to taste.

name: Rice Pudding
description: A sweet, creamy dessert or breakfast dish.
instructions: Combine rice, milk, sugar, and cinnamon in a saucepan. Bring to a simmer and cook until thick and creamy. Stir in vanilla and raisins. Serve warm or chilled.

name: Classic Omelette
description: Quick, protein-rich, and endlessly versatile. Use whatever fillings you have.
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. Melt butter in a non-stick pan. Pour in egg mixture. Cook until edges are set, then add fillings. Fold in half and serve.
